input.sentences: so we got a new tractor at work today .
the scoop is way bigger than our old one .
here it is from the back hauling our green machine .
output.sentences: A big black tractor is hauling a smaller green vehicle away.
They roll over an unfinished dirt road toward the construction site.
The giant wheels on the tractor turns as it moves forward.
The Lamborghini logo flashes in the sunlight.
The two vehicles make it to the construction site.
